      public List<OfferDTO> getOffersByTitle(String title) throws InterruptedException
      search for offers by title -- uses fuzzy search to match the title even if up to 3 letters are different --
      Parameters:
      title - the title to search for
      Returns:
      the list of offers matching the title TODO add the option to search by "contains" besides this fuzzy search

      InterruptedException
